summary: Provides utilities to translate OpenAI‑style embedding requests and responses into the format required by Jina AI's embedding service, and defines a configuration object that encapsulates Jina AI provider details and maps OpenAI parameters to Jina‑compatible settings.
business_intent: Allow applications that use OpenAI embedding interfaces to seamlessly switch to or incorporate Jina AI's embedding backend without code changes, by handling request/response conversion and configuration mapping.
